attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
There is currently six times more imigrant workers than unemployed British citizens, and more of which the Government dont know about, no wonder the employment rate is increasing due to the fact that imigrants work for less, which means that we British born citizens are expeted to take less!!

There is thousands more working for cash in hand and are not paying tax but are receiving tax payers money!!

Say "NO" to imigration !!

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
